Articles.Content: So long time Kerbal player 1st time poster, I stumbled unto KSP when it was first showcased in Kotaku in July of 2011, and then stopped playing around January. I was moving, lost a HHD and had forgotten about this Icon to Space Nerdiness until I stumbled on news of the latest update which blew my mind and I have fallen in love again.

Hi NeoArod and welcome to the community

Have you checked under the sofa cushions for the HDD? I am always losing stuff there

Glad to see you are enjoying KSP NeoArod.

Thanks a lot.

Any idea on how I get permission to customize my profile? IE: Avatar image, ect.
NeoArod, you will be able to do all that once you reach 5 posts and are upgraded to a Bottle Rocketeer, the Curious George phase is an anti-spammer measure just in case
Oh ok awesome, thanks for the info.
